title: Elevator, Cable ready, Upgraded espresso cabinetry*, Closet built-ins
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Ridge at Blue Hills', '800 West Street, Braintree, MA, 02184', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', '(781) 428-4741 x 7', 'First Class Service with a Multitude of Options', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 937 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Ridge at Blue Hills apartments feature the stylish details you are looking for in a luxury Braintree apartment.', 'In addition to the fitness center and resort-style pool, enjoy Ridge at Blue Hills’ outdoor fireplace, poolside grills, private movie screening room, and clubhouse featuring a catering kitchen.', 'Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, your apartment at Ridge at Blue Hills features high ceilings, extra large walk-in closets, slate flooring, a full-sized washer/dryer, and an oversized soaking tub.', 'Close to South Shore Plaza, Interstates 95 and 93, as well as Routes 3 and 37, Ridge at Blue Hills is minutes from MBTA stations in Braintree and Quincy, Logan International Airport, and Boston.', 'Enjoy convenient access to great shopping at South Shore Plaza and escapes to Cape.', 'Experience life near the best of Boston and schedule a tour today.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Features', '- Built-in wine rack', '- Energy efficient appliances', '- Ceiling fan', '- Wag!', 'Preferred Partner', '- Garden tub', '- Balcony / Patio', '- Granite countertops*', '- Pantry', '- Storage units*', '- Maple cabinetry', '-
